author: asianlego
title: Truck Racing is Cool
review: This set is pretty cool, with two customized racing trucks equipped with a rare spoiler each, and also a very rare racetrack roadplate. The roadplate has a zebra crossing/start line but is not shown on the box art. The road can be connected to other normal roadplates but it would look out of place because the roads are wider because it is meant for large racing trucks.
